metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3164 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The authentication setup in XWayland 1.16.x and 1.17.x before 1.17.2 starts the server in non-authenticating mode, which allows local users to read from or send information to arbitrary X11 clients via vectors involving a UNIX socket.

criterions.comment: xorg-server-lts-utopic: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
xorg-server-lts-vivid: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
